Image Recovery With Stellar Phoenix Photo Recovery

12 Sep 2008

Photo Recovery- Product Review

 

 

Stellar Phoenix Photo recovery has been updated to version 3.0 for Mac and Windows OS. The upgrade is free to all versions 2.0 customers. You can update your software using update menu and discover what new features of Updated versions are. New user can download a free demo of the latest version and discover what Photo Recovery can recover for you. If you are happy with the result previews, purchase Photo Recovery from within the demo and the full version will start to work on your lost photos and media cards.

 

The digital photos can go in a single blink of eye as the storage media are fragile to corruption. But Stellar Phoenix Photo Recovery is the sigh of relief. The easy to use photo recovery through Stellar will recover all your photos from different types of storage media supported to Macintosh and Windows operating system.

 

To work at the best for reviewing the interface and efficiency aspects of the software, Stellar offers you the demo version of the software on its site. You can view your lost file from here, but can’t save it. To experience the actual photo recovery, the serial key is required. When you click to run the demo version, the popped up window gives you the option to enter the serial key, the icon to buy the software online and using the demo version anyway.

 

When I was given chance of testing the software, the vendor gave me the suggestion to delete the digital file from the system and to use the software for getting it recovered. But I was eager to run the software for my corrupted memory card to check out the exact performance on Windows supported system.

 

Various Options

 

At the first time when you enter the serial key (vendor entered it) and activate the software, the window of photo recovery software shows you the list of the physical disk and logical drives connected to the system in the left panel. Clicking on either of them gives you two options-photo recovery and Create Image. Clicking the photo recovery options lists the file types and offers you the option of selective photo recovery; also you can go for the particular region scan. After you select the particular file types and at the moment you click to ‘OK’, the scanning starts and all the recoverable files start listing in the left panel, having a unique folder for each file type. These folders are expanded at the bottom of the screen so that you may preview and select them for photo recovery.

 

The create image option lets you to create and save the image at the specified location. This saved image can be further used for recovering the photos.

 

 

 

The options listed at the top of the photo recovery window, allows you to stop the process in mid-way, store the scanning information, buy the software, view some help topics, have full or selective photo recovery, refresh the drive list and creating the drive tree using the existing drive list. If you haven’t purchased the software or have some problems with respect to the software functioning or related issues, the submission of ticket, mail to Stellar support, stellar support section and knowledgebase articles, available in the help option, would help.

 

 

Product Features:

Stellar Phoenix Photo Recovery software help you recover lost images from corrupted or accidentally formatted digital camera memory cards.

  • Performs complete scan of your lost or deleted photo files
  • Program works with ALL types of memory cards!
  • It's able to recover images from formatted cards!
  • Recover from SmartMedia, Compact Flash, Memory Stick, USB, hard drive and more
  • Recovers photo deletions and formatted media cards
  • Can recover pictures of all camera file types such as CR2, CRW, RAF, K25, DCR, MRW, NEF, ORF, PEF, SR2 etc.
  • Recoverable audio file formats are RPS, AU, OGG, WAV, MP3, AIFF, MIDI, M4A, M4P, WMA etc
  • Reads corrupted cards (even if they're not recognized by Windows)!
  • "Event log" of the recovery process made available

 

Minimum System Requirements: To test and run this software you’ll need:

  • Windows ME/NT/2000/XP/Vista or Mac OS X (Depends Upon your OS you’re using).
  • Pentium Class Processor
  • Memory : 256 MB recommended
  • At least 30-MB disk space but it may require up to the size of the card being recovered for workspace.

 

 

Photo Recovery Software - Price and Availability


Stellar Phoenix Photo Recovery supports Mac Operating System as well as Microsoft Windows 9x/NT4/2000/XP/2003 Server/Vista. The trial version demonstrates full functionality of the solution except for the ability to recover files. It will show you the preview of recovered images. To Get Full functionality you must purchase the license key. The software can be purchased for as low as $39.00. Registered customers are entitled to free priority technical support by email and access to program updates. A free trial version of the program is available for download: http://www.photo-recovery-software.com/download-photo-recovery-software.php

 

Demo Trial before You Buy:

Stellar Phoenix Photo Recovery has a free trial copy that would scan and show the list of recoverable files & folders. Once you see your recoverable files, please purchase the software online and recover lost files. Stellar Phoenix Photo Recovery offers a full guarantee of its data recovery capabilities. Once the demo provides you with a preview of your image, that file will be recovered or you will get your money back in 30 days.

 

Conclusion:

Stellar Phoenix Photo recovery cleared all the tests, either related to effective user interface or recovering the lost digital photos even from the hard drives. The only limitation is that data should not be overwritten. The memory card of mine was of 512 MB, and it recovered all those deleted items as well which were even slipping of my mind.  I must say the software does the tremendous job and the best part was that the software recognizes each camera, audio and video file formats. The program performed flawlessly each operation. The interface is good looking and quite interactive.
